Package autumn.lang.compiler.errors

Class CoupledErrorReporter

java.lang.Object
autumn.lang.compiler.errors.CoupledErrorReporter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IErrorReporter
public final class CoupledErrorReporter extends Object implements IErrorReporter
An instance of this class is an error-reporter that routes reports through two other error-reporters. In short, this type of error reporter facilitates the creation of a team of error reporters.
Author:
Mackenzie High

      public void reportSyntaxError(URL file, int line, int column)
      This method reports that the parsing of a module failed.
      Specified by:
      reportSyntaxError in interface IErrorReporter
      Parameters:
      file - is the path to the module's file, as supplied to the compiler.
      line - is an estimate of where parsing failed within the input.
      column - is an estimate of where parsing failed within the input.
